mapper.select: Select reply_seq, board_seq, origin_reply_seq, root_reply_seq, content, id, nickname, (TIMESTAMPDIFF(second , reg_date, now()) / 60) date, reg_date, update_date, del_flag, like_count, main_image, profile from reply where board_seq=#{boardSeq} and reply_seq > 0 order by reply_seq asc, origin_reply_seq asc, root_reply_seq asc limit #{listDTO.skip}, #{listDTO.size}
select count(reply_seq) from reply where board_seq=#{boardSeq} and reply_seq>0
mapper.insert: insert into reply (board_seq, content, id, nickname, profile) values (#{boardSeq}, #{content}, #{id}, #{nickname}, #{profile})
